name: MANNIK & SMITH GROUP ON BEHALF OF THE ROAD COMMISSION FOR OAKLAND COUNTY

sampleDescriptions: Assist client with obtaining federal funding from the Strengthening Mobility and Revolutionizing Transportation (SMART) Grant Program for V2X project.
